throughput.commonCauseDescription: Points inside the LCL and UCL range is considered as common cause, which does not need to be addressed as it is a normal behavior of the system.
throughput.specialCauseDescription: Points outside the LCL and UCL range is considered as special cause, which needs to be addressed and investigated. (Marked by a red circle)

cloudSpending.perServiceTitle: Cloud Costs by Service per Month (Filtered)
cloudSpending.noDataOverall: No data available. Run import and calculate commands with -cloudspending flag.
cloudSpending.noDataServices: No data available. Configure services in config.yml and run import/calculate with -cloudspending flag.

devProcess.crStackedTitle: Change Request count per week (stacked by repo)
